name: bioctree-ui-library
description: Library of custom UI components built with D3.js for integration with MATLAB

d3Brush.description: Interactive brush component with snapping for range selection
d3Brush.compatibility_notes: Uses D3 v5 event model (d3.event global). Do NOT upgrade to D3 v6+ without updating event signatures in brush handlers.

5.9.2.event_handling: Uses d3.event global variable. Event handlers do NOT receive event as parameter.
5.9.2.notes: Current version used by d3Brush component. Breaking changes in v6+.

migration_notes.v5_to_v6: D3 v6+ passes event as first parameter to callbacks. Must update all event handlers: function() { var event = d3.event; } â†’ function(event) { }
migration_notes.v6_to_v7: API stable between v6 and v7 for event handling.
